level.heading: ASSESSMENT OF PUBLIC VEHICLE FOR HIRE OPERATORS (§ 31-1101)

level.text: As provided for in D.C. Official Code § 50-320(d) (2009 Repl.), each public vehicle for hire operator licensed by the Commission shall be assessed fifty dollars ($50) per year upon the issuance or renewal of each operator license identification (Face) card issued pursuant to D.C. Official Code §§ 47-2829(e) and (h) (2012 Supp.).

The assessment levied pursuant to § 1101.1 shall be paid by each public vehicle for hire operator licensed by the Commission in addition to the annual license fee authorized pursuant to D.C. Official Code § 47-2829(e) and (h) (2012 Supp.).
The Commission shall collect the assessment levied at the time of the issuance or renewal of the operator license identification (Face) card of each public vehicle for hire operator.
The Commission shall have deposited into the Public Vehicle for Hire Consumer Service Fund all assessments collected from public vehicle for hire operators licensed by the Commission.

On an annual basis, or at other times as determined by the Commission, the Office of the Chief Financial Officer provide a written report to the Commission of all monies collected and deposited in the Fund.
